mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_item (sequence, order_id, status, product_image, product_name, price, company, status_changed_date, product_link, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{sequence}, #{orderId}, #{status}, #{productImage}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{company}, #{statusChangedDate}, #{productLink}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE order_item SET status = #{status}, status_changed_date = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
